1:
I trust that Yahweh will protect me.\q2 So I do not fly off to the mountains like birds do.
\q1
2:
It is true that wicked people have hidden in the darkness,\q1 that they have pulled back their bowstrings and aimed their arrows
\q2 to shoot them at people who honor Yahweh.


\q1
3:
When wicked people do not suffer for disobeying the laws,\q2 what can righteous people do?
\q1
4:
But Yahweh is sitting on his throne in his sacred temple in heaven,\q2 and he sees everything that people do.


\q1
5:
Yahweh examines what righteous people do and what wicked people do,\q2 and he hates those who love to injure others.
\q1
6:
He will send down from the sky flaming coals and burning sulfur on the wicked;\q2 he will send scorching hot winds to punish them.
\q1
7: Yahweh does everything that is right, and he loves those who do what is right;\q2 such people will come into his presence.
